```{r, echo=FALSE}
raw_data = read_csv("FinalProjectDatax.csv") 
  x <- raw_data 
  

  
  


        
```


```{r, echo=FALSE}
x %>% 
  group_by(TOTAL) %>% 
  mutate(TOTAL= str_remove(TOTAL,"Lv140")) %>% 
  mutate(TOTAL= parse_number(TOTAL)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=COST,y=TOTAL))+
  geom_jitter()+
  theme_classic()+
  facet_wrap(~Type)+
  coord_cartesian(xlim = c(0, 30))
```
